titles.title: Near to the Heart of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a place of quiet rest, Near to the heart of God, A place where sin cannot molest, Near to the heart of God.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O Jesus, blest Redeemer Sent from the heart of God, Hold us, who wait before Thee Near to the heart of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is a place of comfort sweet, Near to the heart of God, A place where we our Savior meet, Near to the heart of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There is a place of full releas, Near to the heart of God, A place where all is joy and peace, Near to the heart of God.
